name: Marvin (BahmGames)
description:
• Marvin is a Virtual Pet game where the player is responsible for caring for an Alien by the same name. Marvin lives in a nice studio apartment on the planet Neevmor.
  • Marvin comes equipped with 9 different actions, different hats to wear, and a day/night cycle that matches real life!
How to Play:

  • Marvin is an entirely point and click operated game
  • The player must keep an eye on Marvin's Hunger and Happiness levels to keep him healthy
  • Different actions are available by clicking on the different objects in Marvin's apartment
    • Actions from the Couch will restore varying amounts of Happiness points
    • Actions from the Fridge will restore 1 Hunger point
    • Actions from the Oven will restore 2 Hunger points

* Note that as a limitation of the jam, the game was not allowed to run in a fullscreen window, so the game is locked in windowed mode at a resolution of 640x320
